actor.description: Blue tones matching Visium brand for human actors

agent.description: Teal and blue tones for software agents

exploit.description: Red and blue tones for security exploits

default.description: Professional blue-gray palette for general node types

actor.emphasis: vector, flat, modern, minimal, professional colors

agent.emphasis: vector, flat, modern, minimal, technical design

exploit.emphasis: vector, flat, modern, minimal, security focused

default.emphasis: vector, flat, modern, minimal, clean design

promptTemplates.vector_illustration: simple {nodeType} cybersecurity icon, {description}, vector, flat, modern, minimal, color, professional blue and teal colors only, no red
promptTemplates.minimal: minimal {nodeType} cybersecurity icon, {description}, vector, flat, simple, clean geometry, professional colors
promptTemplates.professional: corporate {nodeType} cybersecurity icon, {description}, vector, flat, modern, business appropriate, clean design
